## anbox-cloud-appliance daemon

Run the Anbox Cloud Appliance daemon

```
anbox-cloud-appliance daemon [flags]
```

### Examples

```
$ anbox-cloud-appliance daemon
```

### Options

```
      --config string   Path to the daemon configuration file
  -h, --help            help for daemon
```
